channel.title: Advanced Usage on Storj Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Advanced Usage on Storj Docs

item.title: Create Access Grant in CLI
item.description: Create Access Grant in CLI # You need to have a satellite account and installed Uplink CLI. To start, proceed through the initial steps of creating a new Access Grant. 3. When given the options to either continue in the browser or in the CLI, select Continue in CLI. 4. Copy and save the Satellite Address and API Key as it will only appear once. 5. Make sure you’ve already downloaded the Uplink CLI and run uplink setup.
